constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 14 (Friday, January 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PFLUGER:
H.R. 6473.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H295]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Intelligence and Counterterrorism.

title: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to publish the number of known or suspected terrorists encountered attempting to enter the United States on a monthly basis, and for other purposes.
